Release Notes:
--------
Mark Maher, better know as KRAM is the hard hitting drummer/singer from
Spiderbait who had major hits with tracks such as Buy Me A Pony and their
version of the Leadbelly classic Black Betty.

Spiderbait have been stalwarts of the Australian music scene since the early
nineties releasing seven albums throughout their career.
